animeTitle: Travel Back To Ancient Times And Become The Richest Man
otherNames: Time-Traveling to Ancient Times as a Wealthy Tycoon, Traveling back to ancient times to become the richest man, Travel Back To Ancient Times And Become The Richest Man, 穿越到古代当首富
synopsis: When the door between modern and ancient time and space accidentally opens, the fate of an ordinary doctor Lin Ziang is completely rewritten. He travels back to the ancient wealthy Li Mansion hundreds of years ago. He was supposed to be an assassin whose life and death were uncertain, but because of an unexpected treatment, his name suddenly resounded throughout the Li Mansion and even the entire capital.
